${ModID}:FlyingSwords.NAME: Flying Swords
${ModID}:FlyingSwords.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy twice. NL Startup: Gain !M! ${ModID}:Windrush.

${ModID}:GeoDaRay.NAME: Geo Da Ray
${ModID}:GeoDaRay.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Windrush and ${ModID}:Precision.

${ModID}:Overpressure.NAME: Overpressure
${ModID}:Overpressure.FLAVOR: So... you dare to defy me?!

${ModID}:TradeWinds.NAME: Trade Winds
${ModID}:TradeWinds.DESCRIPTION: {@@}${ModID}:Discover an{!Upgrades!|>0= Upgraded} Attack. NL If it is common, heal !M! HP, or if it is rare, lose !${ModID}:m2! gold. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:TempestOfStrikes.NAME: Tempest of Strikes
${ModID}:TempestOfStrikes.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! ${ModID}:Bind a number of times equal to half of the number of Attacks in your deck

${ModID}:FallOver.NAME: Fall Over
${ModID}:FallOver.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !${ModID}:m2! Strength. NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Bind to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:FallOver.FLAVOR: Stay still... and let me slay you!

${ModID}:FeedingWinds.NAME: Feeding Winds
${ModID}:FeedingWinds.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Exhaust a card to gain [E] {!${ModID}:m2!|>0=and !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Windrush}. NL Startup: ${ModID}:Modify !M! random Attacks: "Gain 1 Strength"
${ModID}:FeedingWinds.FLAVOR: Let's see just how strong I am!

${ModID}:EscalatingBreeze.NAME: Escalating Breeze
${ModID}:EscalatingBreeze.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Retain up to !M! card{!M!|>1=s} this turn (after normal Retain effects). NL Attacks Retained this way cost !${ModID}:m2! less next turn.

${ModID}:GaleForce.NAME: Gale-Force
${ModID}:GaleForce.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Whenever you play an Attack, gain ${ModID}:Windrush equal to its cost{!${ModID}:m2!|>1= +!${ModID}:m2!}. NL Whenever you play an Attack with a cost of 1 or greater, draw !M! card.

${ModID}:DownwindBlow.NAME: Downwind Blow
${ModID}:DownwindBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Precision. NL Take 50% less attack damage this turn.
